mapper.select: SELECT a.board_id, a.member_id, a.board_type, a.sub_board_type, a.title, a.content, a.create_date, a.modify_date, b.nickname FROM board a JOIN member b on a.member_id = b.member_id WHERE a.board_id = #{boardId}
mapper.insert: insert into board (member_id, board_type, sub_board_type, title, content, create_date, modify_date) values (#{board.memberId},#{board.boardType},#{board.subBoardType},#{board.title},#{board.content}, #{board.createDate}, #{board.modifyDate})
